Summary: They both looked like a fire floating in the sky, not a light or a star, but a fire.
divs: Sighting DetailsI had walked outside to talk on the phone, then standing in the driveway I noticed what looked like a fire that appeared to hovering, I went back in and got my mom to come and see it, when we got back outside it was was slowly moving towards the south towards us. As it moved past us it turned from fire appearance to a red light. Then as we were watching the first one I seen another one come up from behind the tree line. As we were watching them the first one began to get dim and then it vanished, turning my attention to the second one it slowly came directly overhead, when it was overhead it turned from a fire appearance to red star-like light. It continued on past us and we watched it for a about a minute and it also disappeared.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fort Oglethorpe
There were no other sightings in Fort Oglethorpe on or around July 29th 2012
